data.name: XGlobalSheetSettings
desc: **since**
LibreOffice 4.1

types.name: UserLists
desc: contains the string lists used for sorting and filling.
Each string contains the members of a list, separated by commas.

properties.name: DoAutoComplete
desc: specifies whether automatic completion of text in a cell is used.

properties.name: EnterEdit
desc: specifies whether the enter key can be used to start editing a cell.

properties.name: ExpandReferences
desc: specifies whether formula references are extended when cells are inserted below or to the right of them.

properties.name: ExtendFormat
desc: specifies whether cell formatting is extended when entering data.

properties.name: LinkUpdateMode
desc: specifies the update mode for external linked data.
0 = always
1 = never
2 = on demand

properties.name: MarkHeader
desc: specifies whether the current selection is highlighted in column and row headers.

properties.name: Metric
desc: contains the metric for all spreadsheet documents.

properties.name: MoveDirection
desc: contains the direction the cursor moves after entering cells.

properties.name: MoveSelection
desc: specifies whether the cursor is moved after entering into cells.

properties.name: PrintAllSheets
desc: specifies whether all sheets or only selected sheets are printed.

properties.name: PrintEmptyPages
desc: specifies whether empty pages are printed.

properties.name: RangeFinder
desc: specifies whether ranges are highlighted on the sheet when editing a formula.

properties.name: ReplaceCellsWarning
desc: specifies whether a warning is shown before replacing cells (i.e.
when pasting from clipboard).

properties.name: Scale
desc: contains the default scale for new spreadsheet documents (in percent).
There are several special values:
-1 = Optimal width
-2 = Show whole page
-3 = Page width

properties.name: StatusBarFunction
desc: contains the function that is displayed in the status bar.

properties.name: UsePrinterMetrics
desc: specifies whether printer metrics are used for display.

properties.name: UseTabCol
desc: specifies whether the enter key moves the cursor to the column it was in before using the tab key to change columns.
